Title: Your Best Year Ever, Chapter 2: Some Beliefs Hold You Back
Description:
The second chapter of Your Best Year Ever explores the contrast between scarcity and abundance mindsets and illustrates how our beliefs can either limit or empower us.

Reminder that this is the second chapter in Michael Hyatt's revised and updated best-selling book, Your Best Year Ever. Over the next month, we'll be releasing a few chapters a week so that you can be prepared for 2024 to be your Best Year Ever.

If you want to read or listen to the entire book today, then visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com and pick up a copy. After buying the book, make sure to sign up for your FREE ticket to Your Best Year Ever Live (a $197 value!).

www.yourbestyeareverbook.com.
